meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Claudia Shanaman Chris Oake Gareth Jones Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2613.

td.p: Claudia Shanaman, a high school teacher from York, Pennsylvania
Chris Oake, a public relations vice president from Pasadena, California
Gareth Jones, a real estate appraiser from Visalia, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,199)

tr.td: MAGIC & MAGICIANS
POTENT POTABLES
MYTHOLOGY
GUINNESS RECORDS
"V"OCABULARY

tr.td: The Lexington Public Library, this southern state's oldest, was founded in 1795

Gareth
Chris
Claudia
2-day champion: $11,398
2nd place: La-Z-Boy sofa & loveseat & Minoff table lamps
3rd place: Washburn wood acoustic guitar
Gareth
Chris
Claudia

(including 1 DD),
3 W
(including 2 DDs)
